data.eml:eml: The identity of Schizothorax griseus Pellegrin, 1931, with descriptions of three new species of schizothoracine fishes (Teleostei: Cyprinidae) from China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yang, Jian, Chen, Xiaoyong, Yang, Junxing (2009): The identity of Schizothorax griseus Pellegrin, 1931, with descriptions of three new species of schizothoracine fishes (Teleostei: Cyprinidae) from China. Zootaxa 2006: 23-40, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.185671
